scripts.test:ui: cross-env ALLURE_OUTPUT_DIR=results/ui npx playwright test tests/ui.login.pom.spec.js --project=chromium --headed
scripts.copy:history: if exist allure-report\history xcopy /E /I allure-report\history results/ui\history
scripts.report: npm run test:ui && npm run copy:history && npx allure generate --clean results/ui results/api -o allure-report && npx allure open allure-report
